sentences.english: A truck brings in a delivery in through a wide, slow-moving gate.
sentences.chinese: 一辆卡车通过一扇宽阔的缓慢开启的大门运送物资。

sentences.english: Gorillas are very fierce-looking, with broad shoulders, powerful arms, and pointed teeth.
sentences.chinese: 狒狒样子凶猛，肩膀宽阔，手臂很长，牙齿尖锐。

sentences.english: Broad boulevards are unimpeded by traffic in the new district, called Kangbashi New Area.
sentences.chinese: 宽阔的马路畅通无阻的纵横在名叫康巴什的新城。

sentences.english: The vastness of the lake wide, all ups and downs Island.
sentences.chinese: 宽阔的湖面烟波浩淼，百岛沉浮。

sentences.english: A three-passenger swing hung from the ceiling of the broad front porch.
sentences.chinese: 宽阔的门廊上挂着一个可供三人玩的秋千。

sentences.english: There is a wide veranda under the overhang of the roof.
sentences.chinese: 悬吊的屋顶下是一条宽阔的游廊。

sentences.english: D. ). The city is divided into 9 parts. The streets are broad and neat.
sentences.chinese: 城内分为9个市区，街道宽阔平整，规划整齐。

sentences.english: I want a seat which is close to window and can let me stretch my legs.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要一个伸脚空间宽阔而且靠窗的座位。

sentences.english: The mighty river lay like an ocean at rest.
sentences.chinese: 宽阔的河流海洋般静卧着。

sentences.english: You will feel spacious and calm.
sentences.chinese: 你会感受到宽阔和平静。

sentences.english: The game was played on vast walled and banked playing areas.
sentences.chinese: 比赛在宽阔有围墙的比赛场巨型。
新的降雪使耕地更加宽阔。

sentences.english: The downtown streets are extremely broad. Booths and maple trees are everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 市区的街道及其宽阔，到处都是售货亭和枫树。

sentences.english: The river grows broader as it nears the sea.
sentences.chinese: 这停河越接近海，河面越宽阔。

sentences.english: Which is so flattened that the spider can wrap itself around a twig.
sentences.chinese: 扁蜘蛛有宽阔的腹部，它扁平得能让蜘蛛包裹住细枝。

sentences.english: When streams and rivers run to widelowland, lakes appear.
sentences.chinese: 小溪与江河流到宽阔的低凹地，便出现了湖泊。
